Detailed Description

Listener for position updates. The abstract functions are the callback functions that is called for the respective events.

Create a subclass and implement the callbacks and add a subclass object to the LocationInterface to start getting position update callbacks.

The error function, declared in the super class Listener, will be called for all errors that occur . The status code can be either from the StatusCode enumeration or from LocationStatusCode enumeration.
